text: Louis IV the Saint was a term of the Ludovingian dynasty. He was Landgrave of Thuringia and Saxon Count palatine from 1217 to 1227. He was born on October 28, 1200 and died on September 11, 1227.Landgraf Ludwig IV von Th√ºringen, der Heilige == References == Category:1200 births Category:1227 deaths
title: Louis IV, Landgrave of Thuringia
